name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Robert Eugene ALTLAND, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Robert Eugene ALTLAND, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Allen H. Smith, York, for appellant.
John C. Uhler, Dist. Atty., Floyd P. Jones, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1152
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Robert Eugene ALTLAND, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 1, 1981.
Decided June 4, 1981.
Allen H. Smith, York, for appellant.
John C. Uhler, Dist. Atty., Floyd P. Jones, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
